name: Neon Defense (Fluffy Paws)
description:
My new game initially created for Homa Games Monthly Jam. I found about it on Friday evening, got the idea when I was falling asleep, started working on the game on Saturday evening and completed it (at least in its current state) on Sunday evening. It took me about 12 - 13 hours to create everything from scratch (except the music).

I had to add a loading screen because of delayed audio playback in Chrome. The loading shouldn't take more than 10 seconds.

Music

Quarkstar - Space Fiction

WHAT'S NEXT?

I'll definitely work on Android version. I have also some ideas for adding more features to the game. I'll update this web version after finishing few jams I've registered this game into.
